name: BRAP! Bog-Roll-APocalypse
description:
In a zombie Apocalipse what's your home? Your home is a lonely place where you can close the bath door and do your things with a comic book in your hands and a semi-full bog Roll near you.
But everything is changing and your paper reserve is almost over. So it's the moment for you to go, move out to start your search and try to find your Bog or die .

Fight your war with the zombie army

Credits:

Marco Bianchi
Game Develop & Game Design
